alert.note: Alert for Bay; Genesee; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, Saginaw and northwestern Genesee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking widely scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Linwood to 6 miles northwest of Montrose. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Linwood around 425 PM EDT. Pinconning around 435 PM EDT. Bridgeport around 455 PM EDT. Frankenmuth around 505 PM EDT. Saginaw around 510 PM EDT. Reese and Munger around 515 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Brant, Nelson, Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Fenmore, Burt, Buena Vista Township, Gera and Layton Corners. People attending 90s Flannel Fest should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
